text: Hassan Aboud was one of the the leaders and founders of the Syrian Jihadist group Ahrar al-Sham and he led the group until he died in 2014. He was born in the year 1979 in Hama, Syria. He went by the alias Abu Abdullah al-Hamawi. He died by a bomb attack claimed to have been caused by the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, and ISIS. == References == Category:1979 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Syrian people Category:Islamist insurgents
title: Hassan Aboud
